basics.name: Afzal Najam
basics.label: Consultant and Mobile Developer
basics.summary: Android developer with more than 3 years of professional experience leading development at a startup and 5+ years of hobby experience since 2010. Developing software since I was 12. I have an innate curiosity to learn about new technologies and an eye for detail. Looking to work on interesting, impactful projects with people who are passionate about Android development, and learn from them as I share my own knowledge.

work.summary: Pied Piper is a multi-platform technology based on a proprietary universal compression algorithm that has consistently fielded high Weisman Scoresâ„¢ that are not merely competitive, but approach the theoretical limit of lossless compression.
highlights: Build an algorithm for artist to detect if their music was violating copy right infringement laws
Optimized an algorithm that holds the current world record for Weisman Scores
